[!\[\]()](https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella?trk=public_post_feed-actor-image)

20h

- [Report this post](/uas/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fposts%2Fsatyanadella_check-out-our-new-5-day-ai-challenge-great-activity-7378850599334952960-jDAC&trk=public_post_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=POST&_f=guest-reporting)

Check out our new 5 Day AI challenge. Great opportunity to learn by doing!

[!\[\]()](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tomercohen?trk=public_post_reshare_feed-actor-image)

[Tomer Cohen](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tomercohen?trk=public_post_reshare_feed-actor-name)

Chief Product Officer at LinkedIn

1d

AI is reshaping the way we work, but how do we make sure everyone has a role in shaping the future of their jobs?

That’s why, for National AI in Work Day, we’re launching a hands-on 5 Day AI Challenge to help you get ready.

Whether you’re just starting out with AI or already experimenting with building your own agents, we’ve designed learning paths for every level...from prompt engineering, to vibe coding, to building full-on agents.

Explore the full experience here including a live, interactive event you can join from anywhere: [https://lnkd.in/de9X3WMG](https://lnkd.in/de9X3WMG?trk=public_post_reshare-text)
